items.content_html: We will see how to install Node.js and NPM in Linux in an easy and fast way, we will do it by installing NVM (Node Version Manager).
items.title: Install Node JS on Linux
items.summary: We will see how to install Node.js and NPM in Linux in an easy and fast way, we will do it by installing NVM (Node Version Manager).

items.content_html: Can we save the time we spend configuring our React and Next projects? With Reex CLI we will save a few minutes.

items.content_html: With JavaScript we can do one thing in different ways and it can be a bit threatening, now we will see one of those occasions.

items.content_html: Centering things is something we do every day, so why not learn all the possible ways to do it?
